description.message: Use Helix Sidekick on multiple projects and across multiple tabs and windows.

Project added to Helix Sidekick, but ...

Retrieving the content URL has failed, so you won't be able to use Helix Sidekick in edit mode yet. To add it manually, click the Edit button next to the project's configuration.
